Question
========

In a population, the stochastic variable A follows a probability distribution with mean 77 and standard deviation 21. We draw from this population a sample of size n = 7. Then the sample mean follows a distribution with

Answerlist
----------

* Μ = 11 and σ = 3
* Μ = 11 and σ = 7.94
* Μ = 77 and σ = 3
* Μ = 77 and σ = 7.94

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Μ = 11 and σ = 3: Incorrect
* Μ = 11 and σ = 7.94: Incorrect
* Μ = 77 and σ = 3: Incorrect
* Μ = 77 and σ = 7.94: Correct
